title: Explore 15 mid-level and intermediate architecture job opportunities in New York City
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: This week's edition of our curated career roundup from the Archinect Job board features 15 architecture and design firms in New York City with exciting mid-level/intermediate job opportunities. To look up specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job...
text: This week's edition of our curated career roundup from the Archinect Job board features 15 architecture and design firms in New York City with exciting mid-level/intermediate job opportunities. To look up specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, interviewing skills, and increase your overall chances of getting that next job. S9 Architecture seeks an Intermediate Design Architect in New York City"S9 Architecture is seeking a highly skilled Intermediate Design Architect with strong design skills and a passion for upholding design integrity through technical execution. This position offers the opportunity to work as a lead design architect for iconic projects across North America." The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect. 205 Water Street by S9 Architecture.Workshop/APD seeks an Intermediate Architectural Designer in New York City"We are currently seeking a full-time Intermediate designer with 3-5 years of design experience on architectural and interior design projects where he/she can demonstrate the creative process. Candidates must have advanced digital modeling and rendering skills and professional Revit experience." IMC Architecture seeks an Intermediate Architect in Brooklyn"IMC is currently seeking a candidate for Intermediate Architect with a minimum of 4-7 years of experience with expertise in Building Information Modeling. US experience required. Candidates must be self-motivated, reliable, and able to manage all aspects of a project." The firm is also hiring for a Senior Project Architect and a Project Architect/Interior Designer. O'Neil Langan Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect (Revit-based) in New York City"O’Neil Langan Architects is looking for an intermediate-level architectural designer and project manager to work with us on exciting new retail projects. [...] As an intermediate architect (Project Manager) at OLA, you will be deeply involved in project development from schematic design to construction, with significant opportunity for growth. Working closely with senior staff and principals on each new project, you will receive valuable mentorship from veteran architects as you hone your craft." Tory Burch by O'Neil Langan Architects.Neal Beckstedt Studio seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York City"We are seeking creative and self-motivated individuals who are interested in working in a collaborative team environment on the full spectrum of project typologies – from ground-up construction to interior renovations to custom furniture." The firm is also hiring for a Senior Interior Designer and a Senior Residential Project Manager. Kiss-Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect in Brooklyn"Your work will be at the leading edge of environmental, socially responsible practice. Our in-house standard is productive architecture - positive energy/water/waste. Potential for mixed-use BIPV Passive House projects; hydroponic greenhouse laboratory/classrooms; and research in climate-adaptive radiant and plant-based comfort strategies, and controlled environment agriculture. Responsibilities will include programming, analysis, design, detailing, and site observation." The firm is also hiring for a Research/Sustainability Intern. Bronx River House by Kiss-Architects.Kono Designs seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York CityQualifications include three to five years of experience, proficiency with Revit, Enscape, Rhino, V-Ray, AutoCAD, and Adobe Creative Suite, experience developing projects from schematic design to construction documents, experience preparing technical architectural drawings and construction details, and a knowledge of building systems and construction methods. Fluency in Japanese is a plus. A+I (Architecture Plus Information) seeks an Intermediate Architectural Designer in New York City"As a key member of A+I project teams, you will work closely with fellow team members, not only other architects, but also interior designers, strategists, and brand and graphic designers. Through your strong design and communication skills, you will take a large part in delivering meaningful, beautiful, integrated projects through well-managed processes and communication." Nandinee Phookan Architect seeks an Intermediate/Job Captain in New York City"NPA is seeking a motivated, organized and creative Project Architect/PM to join its team. Working directly under the Principals of the firm, the successful candidate would be responsible for the development of design and construction documents from conceptual sketches and schematic drawings, coordinating with consultants structural, MEP, lighting, AV, consultants." The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect/Manager. Datalot by Nandinee Phookan Architects.James Dixon Architect PC seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York City"James Dixon Architect PC, an award-winning architectural firm, is seeking candidates with the following qualifications: 4 or 5-year professional degree in architecture; substantial high-end residential experience including NYC pre-war apartment renovations and Department of Buildings filing submissions; AutoCAD and graphic design proficiency; construction documents experience." The firm is also hiring for an Intermediate Architect in Portland, OR. GRADE New York seeks an Intermediate Interior Designer in New York City"The Intermediate Designer will lead the project team and manage the design development of specific projects. They will also plan and execute presentations of these designs in graphic forms or detailed scaled models while working generally in an independent and collaborative nature." Time Space Existence 2021 Venice Biennale Exhibit by GRADE New York.StudioCAHS seeks an Intermediate Designer in New York City"The senior architectural designer’s main responsibility will be to report to the principal and work with the junior team. They will be responsible for developing, detailing, and coordinating construction documentation. The intermediate architectural designer will be able to identify the areas of need and lead efforts in solving project problems. The ideal candidate will also have had experience leading in other residential projects." Li Architect Associate seeks an Intermediate Architect/ Designer in Flushing"We seek Architects / Designers with 5 to 10 years of experience to work with senior staff in developing construction documents for cultural, community and residential projects. Candidates must have a sound background working on projects during all phases of development – from concept design through completion of construction." New Condo Building by Li Architect Associate.Sydness Architects seeks an Intermediate Interior Architect or Interior Designer in New York City"We are currently seeking an intermediate level individual with interior architecture or interior design experience. This role will be an active and integral part of our office, offering the ideal candidate opportunities to experience all phases of the design and construction process with ample growth potential. They will be able to take ownership of the projects they are working on while still being guided by senior members of staff. We are currently expanding our work in commercial office interiors and seek an experienced person in this area." Garfinkel Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect in Brooklyn"Garfinkel Architects seeks an intermediate architect to implement the design and CD's of residential rehab/enlargements and associated field surveying . Employee will also be responsible to respond to Department of Buildings plan review." If you don't already, follow Archinect on Facebook, X, Instagram, Pinterest, Linkedin, and Threads, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Facebook, X, Instagram, and Threads feeds.
html:
This week's edition of our curated career roundup from the Archinect Job board features 15 architecture and design firms in New York City with exciting mid-level/intermediate job opportunities.

To look up specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, interviewing skills, and increase your overall chances of getting that next job.

S9 Architecture seeks an Intermediate Design Architect in New York City
"S9 Architecture is seeking a highly skilled Intermediate Design Architect with strong design skills and a passion for upholding design integrity through technical execution. This position offers the opportunity to work as a lead design architect for iconic projects across North America."

The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect.

Workshop/APD seeks an Intermediate Architectural Designer in New York City
"We are currently seeking a full-time Intermediate designer with 3-5 years of design experience on architectural and interior design projects where he/she can demonstrate the creative process. Candidates must have advanced digital modeling and rendering skills and professional Revit experience."

IMC Architecture seeks an Intermediate Architect in Brooklyn
"IMC is currently seeking a candidate for Intermediate Architect with a minimum of 4-7 years of experience with expertise in Building Information Modeling. US experience required. Candidates must be self-motivated, reliable, and able to manage all aspects of a project."

The firm is also hiring for a Senior Project Architect and a Project Architect/Interior Designer.

O'Neil Langan Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect (Revit-based) in New York City
"O’Neil Langan Architects is looking for an intermediate-level architectural designer and project manager to work with us on exciting new retail projects. [...] As an intermediate architect (Project Manager) at OLA, you will be deeply involved in project development from schematic design to construction, with significant opportunity for growth. Working closely with senior staff and principals on each new project, you will receive valuable mentorship from veteran architects as you hone your craft."

Neal Beckstedt Studio seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York City
"We are seeking creative and self-motivated individuals who are interested in working in a collaborative team environment on the full spectrum of project typologies – from ground-up construction to interior renovations to custom furniture."

The firm is also hiring for a Senior Interior Designer and a Senior Residential Project Manager.

Kiss-Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect in Brooklyn
"Your work will be at the leading edge of environmental, socially responsible practice. Our in-house standard is productive architecture - positive energy/water/waste. Potential for mixed-use BIPV Passive House projects; hydroponic greenhouse laboratory/classrooms; and research in climate-adaptive radiant and plant-based comfort strategies, and controlled environment agriculture. Responsibilities will include programming, analysis, design, detailing, and site observation."

The firm is also hiring for a Research/Sustainability Intern.

Kono Designs seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York City
Qualifications include three to five years of experience, proficiency with Revit, Enscape, Rhino, V-Ray, AutoCAD, and Adobe Creative Suite, experience developing projects from schematic design to construction documents, experience preparing technical architectural drawings and construction details, and a knowledge of building systems and construction methods. Fluency in Japanese is a plus.

A+I (Architecture Plus Information) seeks an Intermediate Architectural Designer in New York City
"As a key member of A+I project teams, you will work closely with fellow team members, not only other architects, but also interior designers, strategists, and brand and graphic designers. Through your strong design and communication skills, you will take a large part in delivering meaningful, beautiful, integrated projects through well-managed processes and communication."

Nandinee Phookan Architect seeks an Intermediate/Job Captain in New York City
"NPA is seeking a motivated, organized and creative Project Architect/PM to join its team. Working directly under the Principals of the firm, the successful candidate would be responsible for the development of design and construction documents from conceptual sketches and schematic drawings, coordinating with consultants structural, MEP, lighting, AV, consultants."

The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect/Manager.

James Dixon Architect PC seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York City
"James Dixon Architect PC, an award-winning architectural firm, is seeking candidates with the following qualifications: 4 or 5-year professional degree in architecture; substantial high-end residential experience including NYC pre-war apartment renovations and Department of Buildings filing submissions; AutoCAD and graphic design proficiency; construction documents experience."

The firm is also hiring for an Intermediate Architect in Portland, OR.

GRADE New York seeks an Intermediate Interior Designer in New York City
"The Intermediate Designer will lead the project team and manage the design development of specific projects. They will also plan and execute presentations of these designs in graphic forms or detailed scaled models while working generally in an independent and collaborative nature."

StudioCAHS seeks an Intermediate Designer in New York City
"The senior architectural designer’s main responsibility will be to report to the principal and work with the junior team. They will be responsible for developing, detailing, and coordinating construction documentation. The intermediate architectural designer will be able to identify the areas of need and lead efforts in solving project problems. The ideal candidate will also have had experience leading in other residential projects."

Li Architect Associate seeks an Intermediate Architect/ Designer in Flushing
"We seek Architects / Designers with 5 to 10 years of experience to work with senior staff in developing construction documents for cultural, community and residential projects. Candidates must have a sound background working on projects during all phases of development – from concept design through completion of construction."

Sydness Architects seeks an Intermediate Interior Architect or Interior Designer in New York City
"We are currently seeking an intermediate level individual with interior architecture or interior design experience. This role will be an active and integral part of our office, offering the ideal candidate opportunities to experience all phases of the design and construction process with ample growth potential. They will be able to take ownership of the projects they are working on while still being guided by senior members of staff. We are currently expanding our work in commercial office interiors and seek an experienced person in this area."

Garfinkel Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect in Brooklyn
"Garfinkel Architects seeks an intermediate architect to implement the design and CD's of residential rehab/enlargements and associated field surveying . Employee will also be responsible to respond to Department of Buildings plan review."

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Facebook, X, Instagram, Pinterest, Linkedin, and Threads, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Facebook, X, Instagram, and Threads feeds.
